Malek Soula
+216 96 663 984 | soulamalek00@gmail.com
/linkedinMalek Soula | /githubMalekSoula7 | /twitterMaekl
Ariana, Ariana - 2073, Tunisia
SUMMARY
DevOps Engineer with hands-on experience in automation, cloud infrastructure (AWS/Azure/GCP), and CI/CD
pipelines, containerization (Docker / Kubernetes / Jenkins), and agile methodologies. Enhance monitoring and
strengthen security in cloud-native environments through efficient problem solving and automation.
EXPERIENCE
• AXEFINANCE [/gl⌢be] July 2025 - september 2025
Performance Testing Tunis, Tunisia
◦ Conducted performance testing with JMeter and Python, running CLI-based load tests in an automated manner to
prevent system crashes and return correct results.
◦ Created a robust comparison framework to evaluate test results against baselines to find regressions in throughput
and response times.
◦ Integrated performance validation in CI/CD pipelines, setting thresholds to guarantee system reliability prior to
production deployment.
.
• SIBTEL [/gl⌢be] July 2024 - August 2024
Web Security Internship Tunis, Tunisia
◦ Engineered a RESTful API incorporating OWASP guidelines and WS-Security standards, fortifying data
transmission and access controls, and preventing an estimated 400+ common web exploits.
◦ Implemented TLS Certification, enhancing the communication security
◦ Enhanced API security by developing custom security checklist of 25 items based on OWASP and WS-Security
guidelines; served as most junior member on team guiding junior engineers.
.
EDUCATION
• Higher Institute Of Computer Science Sept 2023 - July 2026
Bachelor in Computer Science Ariana, Tunisia
• Borj Louzir High School June 2023
High School Degree in Computer Science with Very High Honors Ariana, Tunisia
PROJECTS
• CI/CD Pipeline Optimization April 2025 - April 2025
Tools: Docker, Jenkins, Python [/github]
◦ Built an image search engine using OpenCV and VGG16 to find similar images with a Tkinter GUI.
◦ Designed and deployed a CI/CD pipeline (Jenkins/GitLab) for an image search engine, reducing the manual
deployment time.
◦ Optimized performance to deliver results in less than 500 ms for 1000+ images.
◦ Implemented user-friendly folder selection functionality allowing flexible switching between multiple image
databases (JPEG/PNG formats)
SKILLS
• DevOps & Version Control :Git, Linux, Docker, Jenkins, Azure DevOps, Kubernetes
• Programming Languages :Java, Python, C
• Web Technologies :HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, SpringBoot, NextJS
• Database Systems :Oracle, PostgreSQL,SQL Server
• Cloud Technologies :AWS
VOLUNTEER EXPERIENCE
• IEEE ISI SB Vice Chair / IEEE ISI CS SBC Chair Aout 2024 - Present
IEEE ISI Student Branch
◦ Led a team of 15+ members to organize 6+ tech workshops (CyberSecurity, Web development, Cloud/DevOps,
Competitive programming) with 200+ total attendees, boosting student engagement.
◦ Led 3 big competitions with 60+ participants, building connections with over 3 local tech companies, and applied
project management and public speaking skills in event organization and mentoring junior members.
CERTIFICATIONS
• Cisco DevNet Associate Novembre 2024
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
Languages: English (Fluent), Arabic (Native), French (Mid level)
Interests: DevOps, Cloud Computing, Cybersecurity
